/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their architecture hinting at the rich history and culture of the city. Vehicles, including cars and buses, traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day, contributing to the lively atmosphere. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. In the distance, trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the cityscape. The image is bathed in daylight, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
